title: Are you a physiotherapist?
text: Join our physio club to get started with Physicle.

section.title: Telehealth
section.content: Transform your physiotherapy practice by going with our HIPPA compliant patient management system to provide telehealth physiotherapy services. All you have to do is to send patients home with Physicle upon discharge and you are good to go.

section.title: Patient dashboard
section.content: We provide a dashboard for healthcare providers to see the daily rehabilitation progress of all patients at a glance. Range of motion, pain score, and daily physiotherapy session completion rates make it easy to track 6 month and even 12 month progress post-operation.
